Card.name: WARRIOR
Card.description: Deal 2 damage on 1 range in all four directions.

Card.name: Warrior C
Card.description: Move in a chosen direction. Stop at first enemy hit. Deal 1 damage and bump one tile.

Card.name: Oil Slick
Card.description: Bump all enemies in a straight line behind you to the side.

Card.name: Whirlwind
Card.description: Deal 2 damage on 1 range on all 8 directions.

Card.name: Slam
Card.description: Deal 2 damage in a tile and the 2 neighbouring tiles in a chosen direction.
